arguments.template:
<!--<kendo-tabstrip #tabStrip id="chartsSchemaEditor" class="schema-editor-tab h-100 pt-1" (tabSelect)="handleTabSelect($event)">-->
<farris-tabs  [value]="'type'" [contentFill]="true" [autoTitleWidth]="true"  (tabChange)="handleTabSelect($event)">
  <farris-tab [title]="localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsType.tab')" [id] = "'type'">
    <ng-template #content>
      <charts-type [currSchema]="currSchema" class="schema-editor-tab" (chartTypeChange)="chartTypeChange($event)" ></charts-type>
    </ng-template>
  </farris-tab>
  <farris-tab [title]="localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsData.tab')" [id] = "'data'">
    <ng-template #content>
      <charts-data [currSchema]="currSchema" class="schema-editor-tab" [colList]="colList" [chartsType]="chartsType" ></charts-data>
    </ng-template>
  </farris-tab>
  <farris-tab [title]="localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsStyle.tab')" [id] = "'style'">
    <ng-template #content>
      <charts-style [currSchema]="currSchema" class="schema-editor-tab" [chartsType]="chartsType" ></charts-style>
    </ng-template>
  </farris-tab>
</farris-tabs>

{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsData.dimensionSetting')}}
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsData.xAxis')}}
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsData.yAxis')}}
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsData.name')}}
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsData.numerical1')}}
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsData.longitude')}}
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsData.latitude')}}
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsData.numerical2')}}

{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsStyle.titleOption')}}
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsStyle.multiDataOption')}}
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsStyle.legend')}}
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsStyle.visualMap')}}
min: max:
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.chartsSchemaManager.chartsStyle.otherStyle')}}

{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.formatManager')}}
 {{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.preFormat')}}  {{item.schemaName}}

<farris-tabs [value]="'title'"  [contentFill]="true" [autoTitleWidth]="true"  (tabChange)="handleTabSelect($event)">
  <farris-tab [title]="localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.titleOption.tab')" [id]="'title'">
    <ng-template #content>
      <title-editor [currSchema]="currSchema" class="schema-editor-tab d-flex flex-column flex-fill"></title-editor>
    </ng-template>
  </farris-tab>
  <farris-tab [title]="localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.columnOption.tab')" [id]="'column'">
    <ng-template #content>
      <column-editor [currSchema]="currSchema" [colList]="colList" [controlType]="controlType"  class="schema-editor-tab d-flex flex-column flex-fill"></column-editor>
    </ng-template>
  </farris-tab>
  <farris-tab [title]="localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.styleOption.tab')" [id]="'style'">
    <ng-template #content>
      <style-editor [currSchema]="currSchema" class="schema-editor-tab d-flex flex-column flex-fill"></style-editor>
    </ng-template>
  </farris-tab>
  <farris-tab [title]="localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.otherOption.tab')" [id]="'other'">
    <ng-template #content>
      <other-editor [currSchema]="currSchema"  [controlType]="controlType"  class="schema-editor-tab d-flex flex-column flex-fill"></other-editor>
    </ng-template>
  </farris-tab>
</farris-tabs>

{{ctx.node.data['name']}} {{ctx.node.data['bindField']}} {{getAlignName(ctx.node.data['align'])}} {{ctx.node.data['colWidth']}} {{ctx.node.data['visible']}}
{{ctx.node.data['isFixed']}}
{{getComboboxName(0, !ctx.node.data['autoFit'] && !ctx.node.data['wordWrap'] ? -1 : ctx.node.data['autoFit'] ? 1 : 2)}}
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.columnOption.selection2')}}

{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.titleOption.subTitleColumnName')[0]}} {{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.titleOption.subTitleColumnName')[1]}} {{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.titleOption.subTitleColumnName')[2]}} {{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.titleOption.subTitleColumnName')[3]}}

{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.styleOption.preview')}}
AaBbYyZz

{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.otherOption.selection')}}
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.otherOption.treeInfo')}}
{{localizeService.getValue('ideCmp.schemaManager.otherOption.groupOption')}}
